reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Lesotho - TB/HIV - Pact, Inc.

description.narrative: Lesotho - TB/HIV - Pact, Inc. - Pact, Inc.. This program has the following goals: Reduced HIV incidence by at least 75% from current baselines, by 2023. Reduced AIDS Related deaths by 50% from current baselines, by 2023. Mother to child transmission of HIV eliminated, (from 6% to less than 2%), by 2023. TB mortality and incidence reduced by 75% and 50% respectively, by 2023. The objectives of this program are: To Fast Track Test and Treat Cascade to attain 95-95-95 targets by 2023. To achieve 95% access to combination prevention by 2023. To Eliminate Mother to Child Transmission and have 95% of children living with HIV on treatment by 2023. To remove Gender and Human Rights Related Barriers to service delivery, accessibility and utilization by 2023. To ensure that 75% of PLHIV, at risk of and affected by HIV benefit from HIV-sensitive social protection by 2023. To ensure that at least 40% of the HIV/TB response is community-led and sustained by 2023. To ensure that Health System is people-centered, and sustainably integrates HIV, TB, and other infections by 2023. To increase efficiencies and financial investments in HIV and TB programs from 60% to 90% of the NSP budget by 2023

description.narrative: Living support to client/ target population (LSCTP)

title.narrative: Coverage / Output indicator for LSO-C-PACT
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - individual and/or smaller group level interventions
YP-Other 1: Percentage of young people aged 10–24 years reached by Comprehensive Sexuality Education out of schools
Number of adolescent girls and young women (AGYW) who were tested for HIV and received their results during the reporting period
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
TCS-Other 1(M): Number of people living with HIV currently receiving antiretroviral therapy enrolled in Community Adherence Groups (CAGs)
Percentage of other vulnerable populations that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
TCS-Other 2(M): Number of adolescents and young people living with HIV currently receiving antiretroviral therapy newly enrolled in Youth Adherence clubs
Number of people who were tested for HIV and received their results during the reporting period
Percentage of sex workers that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of individuals from targeted population reached through community outreach with standardized HIV prevention interventions
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of adolescent girls and young women (AGYW) reached with HIV prevention programs- defined package of services
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
YP-other 1: Percentage of young people aged 10–24 years reached by life skills–based HIV education out of schools
Percentage of other vulnerable populations reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of young people aged 10–24 years reached by life skills–based HIV education in schools
Impact indicator for LSO-C-PACT
Number of new HIV infections per 1000 uninfected population
TB/HIV mortality rate per 100,000 population
Percentage of people living with HIV
Percentage of men who have sex with men who are living with HIV
Number of AIDS-related deaths per 100,000 population
Estimated percentage of children newly infected with HIV from mother-to-child transmission among women living with HIV delivering in the past 12 months
TB mortality rate per 100,000 population
TB prevalence rate per 100,000 population
Percentage of sex workers who are living with HIV
Percentage of young people aged 15–24 who are living with HIV
Outcome indicator for LSO-C-PACT
Percentage of women and men aged 15-49 who have had sexual intercourse with more than one partner in the past 12 months
Case notification rate of all forms of TB per 100,000 population - bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed, new and relapse cases
Proportion of ever-married or partnered women aged 15-49 who experienced physical or sexual violence from a male intimate partner in the past 12 months
Treatment success rate of RR TB and/or MDR-TB: Percentage of cases with RR and/or MDR-TB successfully treated
Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART who are virologically suppressed
Treatment success rate of all forms of TB - bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed, new and relapse cases
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a male partner
Percentage of adults and children with HIV, known to be on treatment 12 months after initiation of antiretroviral therapy
Percentage of sex workers reporting the use of a condom with their most recent client
Percent of respondents who say they used a condom the last time they had sex with a non-marital, non-cohabiting partner, of those who have had sex with such a partner in the last 12 months
Percentage of other vulnerable populations who report the use of a condom at last sexual intercourse
